allow:
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "
# Use Invoke-WebRequest and write script without dollar signs in -Command string
# Instead use a base64 encoded command approach
$b64 = [Convert]::ToBase64String\([System.Text.Encoding]::Unicode.GetBytes\(@''
$wc = New-Object System.Net.WebClient
$wc.Headers[""User-Agent""] = ""Mozilla/5.0 \(Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64\) AppleWebKit/537.36""
$wc.Headers[""Accept-Language""] = ""ja""
$wc.Encoding = [System.Text.Encoding]::UTF8
$html = $wc.DownloadString\(""https://kakuyomu.jp/works/1177354054885377893""\)
[IO.File]::WriteAllText\(""C:\\temp\\kakuyomu_toc.html"", $html\)
Write-Host \(""Saved: "" + \(Get-Item ""C:\\temp\\kakuyomu_toc.html""\).Length + "" bytes""\)
''@\)\)
Write-Host $b64.Substring\(0, 50\)
")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "
# Generate b64 of the fetch+analyze script
$script = @''
$wc = New-Object System.Net.WebClient
$wc.Headers[""User-Agent""] = ""Mozilla/5.0 \(Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64\) AppleWebKit/537.36""
$wc.Headers[""Accept-Language""] = ""ja""
$wc.Encoding = [System.Text.Encoding]::UTF8
$html = $wc.DownloadString\(""https://kakuyomu.jp/works/1177354054885377893""\)
[IO.File]::WriteAllText\(""C:\\temp\\kakuyomu_toc.html"", $html, [System.Text.Encoding]::UTF8\)
Write-Host \(""Saved: "" + \(Get-Item ""C:\\temp\\kakuyomu_toc.html""\).Length + "" bytes""\)
''@
$bytes = [System.Text.Encoding]::Unicode.GetBytes\($script\)
$b64 = [Convert]::ToBase64String\($bytes\)
[IO.File]::WriteAllText\(""C:\\temp\\b64cmd.txt"", $b64\)
Write-Host ''b64 written''
Write-Host \($b64.Length.ToString\(\) + '' chars''\)
")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "
# Generate b64 of the analysis script
$script = @''
$html = [IO.File]::ReadAllText\(""C:\\temp\\kakuyomu_toc.html"", [System.Text.Encoding]::UTF8\)
Write-Host \(""HTML length: "" + $html.Length\)
$noScript = [regex]::Replace\($html, ""<script[\\s\\S]*?</script>"", ""[SCRIPT_REMOVED]""\)
$noStyle = [regex]::Replace\($noScript, ""<style[\\s\\S]*?</style>"", ""[STYLE_REMOVED]""\)
Write-Host \(""After script/style removal: "" + $noStyle.Length\)
Write-Host """"
Write-Host ""=== Non-script HTML first 5000 chars ===""
Write-Host $noStyle.Substring\(0, [Math]::Min\(5000, $noStyle.Length\)\)
''@
$bytes = [System.Text.Encoding]::Unicode.GetBytes\($script\)
$b64 = [Convert]::ToBase64String\($bytes\)
[IO.File]::WriteAllText\(""C:\\temp\\b64analyze.txt"", $b64\)
Write-Host ''b64 analyze written''
")
